comment: One of the nicest professors during my time at KSU, his class was graded by few things. 4 "Big" Assignments (2 Involving Volunteering which is easy bc one is just submitting where you'll volunteer & the second one is proof & explaining), 1 is a recording of a topic you're assigned, 1 on reflections. Also 3 tests that are super easy. TAKE HIM!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: I cannot stress this enough, if you have a course that he teaches, TAKE HIM!! He was probably the best professor I have ever had in my five years in college. His lectures were so useful and were easy to learn, we have a couple projects but they are so easy to complete. He gives feedback and is able to help you whenever you need.

Joshua Palmer is one of the best professors I've ever had.  The material is very clearly written.  His expectations in the syllabus are clearly spelled out, so there's no confusion.  He lets you know exactly what he'll be looking for on the tests.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: class was just listening to lectures he posted online but made it easy to study for with study guides. tests are lockdown with webcam but very similar to study guide. theres a group project all semester thats papers but theyre super easy and he isnt a tough grader at all

Professor Palmer was amazing! He has a great personality and makes his class super easy and manageable! 3 exams and 1 makeup exam as well as 3 group papers(super easy and he gives you a template to follow). If you can take him do it you wont regret it! Plus he shows a lot of funny videos to keep you engaged (90 day finance, the office, etc.)

Professor Palmer is a very laid back professor. He uses a lot of Office and Parks & Rec clips within his lectures to keep things interesting.

Class Layout:
Attendance-10
3 Exams- 60pts
2 Group Papers (Easy)/ Team operating agreement/ Peer Evaluations- 25pts
1 Quiz- 5pts
Total of 100 points, with at least 3 bonus point opportunities

He's Awesome!

I had a great time in this class! The lectures were really fun, and always had plenty of clips from The Office. He also allowed for plenty of class discussion. The tests aren't hard if you just review the slides, and outside of that you only have to do a group project. Overall a really sweet guy, and I recommend taking his class!
